root: ^Oh look! Maybe I can use this spool for something useful!

b: ^You can use the spool to stitch the teddy bear! You feel a sense of relief.
^You haven't found the teddy bear yet. You feel a sense of unease.

bear_found: ^With the teddy bear in your possession, you feel ready to face any challenges that come your way.
bear_missing: ^Without the teddy bear, you feel vulnerable and a little scared. You decide to continue your search.
